critique: The document expresses concern for public safety and national security, particularly regarding removable aliens who have committed crimes. It aims to enforce immigration laws and penalize sanctuary jurisdictions. There is a sense of urgency and determination to address the perceived threats. The document also expresses support for victims of crimes committed by removable aliens. It does not express joy. It expresses sadness for the harm caused by removable aliens. It expresses anger towards sanctuary jurisdictions. It expresses fear for public safety. It expresses disgust for the crimes committed by removable aliens. It expresses surprise that the immigration laws have not been faithfully executed.
